## Summary Report

Generated on: `r Sys.Date()`
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

# Simple demo data
data <- data.frame(
  month = month.abb[1:6],
  sales = c(150, 180, 165, 200, 190, 220)
)

# Create plot
ggplot(data, aes(x = month, y = sales)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Monthly Sales", y = "Sales ($)")
```

## Key Metrics

- Total Sales: `r sum(data$sales)`
- Average: `r round(mean(data$sales), 1)`
